props.block: Expands the button to 100% of available space.
props.fab: Designates the button as a floating-action-button. Button will become _round_.
props.icon: Designates the button as icon. Button will become _round_ and applies the **text** prop.
props.left: Aligns the component towards the left. This should be used with the **absolute** or **fixed** props.
props.outlined: Makes the background transparent and applies a thin border.
props.plain: Removes the default background change applied when hovering over the button.
props.right: Aligns the component towards the right. This should be used with the **absolute** or **fixed** props.
props.rounded: Applies a large border radius on the button.
props.text: Makes the background transparent. When using the **color** prop, the color will be applied to the button text instead of the background.
